column4: is there anyone who knows if it can be done? is anyone reading this and my previous msgs? cant someone respond? am i forced to live without linux or go buy a new pc? ffs is linux any different or jsut a harder to use widows clone?
calm down will you. there's more than just you in the channel needing help
you've just come in on the back of a quiet time when it's mostly people with their own problems talking
try the search results here, they will help http://www.google.com.au/search?hl=en&q=setting+up+local+debian+repository&btnG=Google+Search&meta=
